chinese: ad邪恶的n.邪恶，罪恶
魇鬼的眼中闪过一丝邪恶的光。
english: This devilish monster has an evil stare

chinese: 业.沉浸，沉浸于
她完全沉浸在那本书中，没有听见她妈妈的呼
english: She immersed herself in the book and didn't hear her mother calling

chinese: n.杂种 ad），混合的；杂种的
骡子是马和驴的杂交后代。
english: A mule is a hybrid between a horse and a donkev

chinese: n. 协约
这些国家最终达成了气候变化协议。
english: These countries finally came into a climate change pact

chinese: 1，现实，实际
没有滤镜的照片使我认清了现实。
english: The photo without filter makes me realize the reality

chinese: ad）.原始的；简陋的 n.原始人
原始人不能用电，只能自己生火。
english: Primitive men made fire by themselves since they had no electricity

chinese: n.战斗，格斗四与…•战斗、与…斗争
那两个男人在进行生死格斗。
english: The two men were locked in combat, that is, in a fight to the death

chinese: ad，难闻的，发臭的 几.犯规
那个闻起来太臭了。
adj.明显的；公开的；公然的
很明显，这只狗想吃那盘意大利面。
english: It is overt that the dog wanted to eat that spaghetti

chinese: ad，无限的，无穷的n，无穷，无限大
我们生活在一个无边无际的宇宙里。
english: We live in an infinite universe that has no boundaries

chinese: ad）接连的；连续的
多米诺骨牌接二连三地倒下了。
english: Dominoes fall down in a successive way

chinese: n. 小册子
这家餐厅每天向行人发数百份宣传册。
english: This restaurant gives out hundreds of pamphlets to pedestrians every day

chinese: 1.深度；深刻；深处
这条河大概3米深。
english: The depth of the river is about 3 meters

chinese: ad.视觉的
这个视觉幻象让我们在这张照片中看到两张人脸。
english: This optical illusion causes us to see two faces in the photo

chinese: （枪等的）扳机vE.触发，引起，激
扣动枪的扳机开火。
english: Pulling the gun's trigger causes it to fire

chinese: n.秘书；部长，大臣
这个秘书负责接听电话、安排会议和处理一般性事务。
english: The secretary takes phone calls, arranges meetings and takes care of general affairs
